definition: to do harm to/to cause trouble to/harm/evil/calamity

sentences.english: The Eimeria species, causative agents of the disease coccidiosis, are genetically complex protozoan parasites endemic in poultry.
sentences.chinese: 鸡球虫病是严重危害养禽业的一种寄生虫病。

sentences.english: The spontaneous combustion of coal seam endangers the safe production.
sentences.chinese: 井下煤层自燃严重危害着安全生产。

sentences.english: We should severely punish tax-dodging crime because it endangers the tax administration system seriously.
sentences.chinese: 偷税犯罪严重危害税收征管秩序，应予以重点打击。

sentences.english: First of all, much tail gas released by cars harm pollutes the fresh air gravely.
sentences.chinese: 首先，汽车尾气的释放严重危害了新鲜的空气。

sentences.english: Underground pest is a kind of important pests that endangers sugarcane produce in Yunnan.
sentences.chinese: 地下害虫是严重危害云南甘蔗生产的一类重要害虫。

sentences.english: Colorectal Cancer is one of the commonest malignancies which threaten the health of human.
sentences.chinese: 结直肠癌是严重危害人类健康的常见恶性肿瘤之一。

sentences.english: Newcastle disease was one of poultry's serious diseases.
sentences.chinese: 新城疫是严重危害养禽业的疾病之一。

sentences.english: The weaned piglets diarrhea was a kind of disease that seriously harmed swine industry.
sentences.chinese: 断奶仔猪腹泻是一类严重危害养猪业发展的疾病。

sentences.english: Developing countries are likely to be at most risk from the pandemic.
sentences.chinese: 发展中国家可能会受到大流行疫情的最严重危害。

sentences.english: It is toxic and dose serious harmer to environment.
sentences.chinese: 残留期长，对环境有严重危害。

sentences.english: Formaldehyde is a toxicant, it threaten human being's health.
sentences.chinese: 甲醛是一种有毒物质，严重危害人的身体健康。

sentences.english: They are a serious danger to the normal life and productive activities of the people.
sentences.chinese: 严重危害人民正常的生活和生产秩序。

sentences.english: Having such a person in your team would severely damage performance.
sentences.chinese: 团队中的这种人会严重危害团队的整体表现。

sentences.english: The serious losses of crops were engendered by Western flower thrips.
sentences.chinese: 西花蓟马的发生给农作物造成严重危害和经济损失。

sentences.english: Verticillium dahliae Kleb. harms seriously production of cotton.
sentences.chinese: 黄萎病严重危害棉花生产。

sentences.english: The long-term negative health effects of sleep deprivation have been studied and documented.
sentences.chinese: 长期的睡眠剥夺已经被研究证明是严重危害健康的。

definition: to jeopardize/to harm/to endanger/harmful effect/damage/CL:個|个[ge4]
to endanger/to jeopardize/a danger (to life, national security etc)
to lead to death/to result in death
to strike a severe blow/to crack down/to take strong measures
to prevent/to take precautions against/to protect/to guard against/precautionary/prophylactic
